'''Spear Flourish''' is an [[Character Card Elemental Skill|Elemental Skill]] for [[Yun Jin (Character Card)|Yun Jin]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

This skill is executed automatically 1 turn after [[Opening Flourish (Character Card Skill)|Opening Flourish]].
